channel.title: [PI] How to change client background?
channel.description:
Hi every1, i try tu use eudora world server by Aintaro, but i don't know how to change backgound image and the login box image.I heard litle that i need to download a cache siute.But where i can download it? And how whit cache siute change the bacngound and the login bos image? Can enyone help me? :) Thanks.
Image of client: [img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/3789/1234563.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] How to change client background?
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497

Image of client:
[/img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/3789/1234563.png[/img][/quote]
What is English
Look for the background image itself if this is Delta. It should be “background.png” or something. Check the sprites folder I guess.
Also, this is Client Sided.
